questions: Q. 1. In which list of the Indian Constitution does education come ? Why ?
answers: Ans. Education comes under concurrent list so that both the centre and the states can legislate on any aspect of education.  1

questions: Q. 2. What status has been given to Hindi by the Constitution of India ? [Board Term-I, Term-I, Set  2015]
answers: Ans. Official language of the the country.  1

questions: Q. 3. Much of the official work in Indian states is done in which language ?
answers: Ans. Much of the official work is done in the official language of the concerned State.

questions: Q. 4. What is the official post for the chairperson of a Municipal Corporation ?
Q. 5. Which local body has a ‘Mayor’ as its head ? [Board Term-I, Set ,  2014]
Q. 6. By which name the rural local government is popularly known ?
Q. 7. Which state in India has a special status
Q. 8. How many other languages are recognised as Scheduled Languages by the constitution, besides Hindi ?
Q. 9. The system of Panchyati Raj works at which levels ?
answers: Ans. The village, block and district levels.
